globalwatchlist-gotoglobal: Link text for the link from [[Special:Watchlist]] to [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]]
globalwatchlist-gotoglobal-tooltip: Tooltip for the link from [[Special:Watchlist]] to [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]]
globalwatchlist-must-login: Text shown to anonymous users trying to use [[Special:GlobalWatchlist]] and [[Special:GlobalWatchlistSettings]]
globalwatchlist-javascript-required: Message shown when Javascript is not enabled
